mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id, a.password, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2, a.church_officer, a.diocese, a.user_status, TO_CHAR(a.regist_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regist_date FROM tb_com_user a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.user_id

SELECT a.user_id, a.password, a.user_name, a.birth_date , a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2 , a.church_officer, a.diocese, a.user_status , (SELECT code_name FROM tb_com_code b WHERE a.church_officer = b.code_seq) church_officer_name , TO_CHAR(a.regist_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regist_date , count(1) over() total_count FROM tb_com_user a ORDER BY a.user_name, a.user_id LIMIT #{countPerPage} OFFSET (#{pageIndex}-1)*#{countPerPage}
SELECT A.code_seq, A.code_name, A.code_desc, A.code_level, A.parent_code_seq, A.display_order FROM tb_com_code A WHERE A.parent_code_seq = #{parentCodeSeq} ORDER BY A.display_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sys_file_info ( file_seq, file_type, file_size, file_path, file_name, real_file_name, upload_date ) VALUES (#{fileSeq} , #{fileType} , #{fileSize} , #{filePath} , #{fileName} , #{realFileName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT a.file_seq, a.file_type, a.file_size, a.file_path, a.file_name, a.real_file_name, a.upload_date FROM tb_sys_file_info a WHERE a.file_seq = (SELECT file_seq FROM tb_bunyang_file_form WHERE file_form_type = #{fileFormType})
SELECT a.file_seq, a.file_type, a.file_size, a.file_path, a.file_name, a.real_file_name, a.upload_date FROM tb_sys_file_info a WHERE a.file_seq = #{fileSeq}
